channel.title: [508] How do I add Dragon Claws to my server [508]
channel.description: Hey, I'm wondering to how to change my rune claws to dragon claws then give them a special. If you could help me that would be great.

item.title: [508] How do I add Dragon Claws to my server [508]
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

do u have the dragon claw models and ints? if not i may be able to get u one

item.description:

if not that would be the first step. you change the appearance of an item through the client not the server, but the spec im not as familiar with…

item.title: [508] How do I add Dragon Claws to my server [508]

item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

Thanks… But no thanks.
I’m wanting someone to tell me on here, not on google. I’ll find a bunch of randomness there.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 18, 2009, 04:15:12 pm[/size][hr][quote=“zane02, post:6, topic:302920”]Well im not really a 508 coder lol, but umm if you know how to add your own models to a 508 i can get you a model maker. ;p[/quote]
If you could that would be great, maybe add some instructions on it too. =P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 18, 2009, 04:11:46 pm[/size][hr][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=399183.msg2961585#msg2961585 date=1253242296]

[quote=“Fallen127, post:3, topic:302920”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=399183.msg2961504#msg2961504 date=1253237952]
www.google.com

Well, I wouldn’t be on here asking for help then would I…[/quote]

Id be finding it for you. Think before you post. You pathetic idiot.
